info.title: AutoERP API
info.description: Enterprise-grade Multi-Tenant ERP System - RESTful API Documentation

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of chart of accounts with filtering by type, status, parent account, and search capabilities

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: Filter by parent account ID (for hierarchical accounts)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in account code, name, or description

post.description: Create a new account in the chart of accounts with support for hierarchical parent-child relationships

422.description: Validation error - Invalid or duplicate account code

get.description: Retrieve hierarchical tree structure of all accounts for chart of accounts display

data.description: Hierarchical array of accounts with nested children

get.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific account including balance and transaction history

put.description: Update an existing account. System accounts may have restrictions on updates.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid data or system account restriction

delete.description: Delete an account from the chart of accounts. System accounts and accounts with transactions cannot be deleted.

400.description: Bad request - Cannot delete account with transactions or system account

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of invoices with filtering by status, customer, date range, overdue status, and search capabilities

parameters.name: overdue
parameters.description: Filter to show only overdue invoices

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in invoice number, customer name, or notes

post.description: Create a new customer invoice with line items. Invoice will be created in draft status by default. Optionally link to a sales order.

422.description: Validation error - Invalid customer, product, or date

post.description: Automatically generate an invoice from an existing sales order. All order details including items, customer, and pricing will be copied to the new invoice.

201.description: Invoice generated from sales order successfully

message.example: Invoice generated from sales order successfully

400.description: Bad request - Order already invoiced or invalid status

get.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific invoice including all line items, payment history, and financial calculations

put.description: Update an existing invoice. Only draft invoices can have items modified. Status can be updated on sent invoices.

400.description: Bad request - Cannot update paid or cancelled invoice

delete.description: Delete an invoice. Only draft invoices can be deleted. Sent or paid invoices should be cancelled instead to maintain audit trail.

400.description: Bad request - Cannot delete non-draft invoice

post.description: Send the invoice to the customer via email and update status to 'sent'. Invoice must be in draft status.

400.description: Bad request - Invoice already sent or invalid status

500.description: Server error - Failed to send email

post.description: Manually mark an invoice as fully paid. This updates the invoice status to 'paid' and records the full payment date. Use payment allocation for partial payments.

400.description: Bad request - Invoice already paid or cancelled

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of journal entries with filtering by posting status, date range, and search capabilities

parameters.name: is_posted
parameters.description: Filter by posting status (true=posted, false=draft, null=all)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in entry number, reference, or description

post.description: Create a new double-entry journal entry with at least 2 lines. Total debits must equal total credits. Entry can be created as draft or posted immediately.

requestBody.description: Journal entry data with at least 2 lines (debits must equal credits)

400.description: Bad request - Debits do not equal credits or invalid balance

422.description: Validation error - Invalid account IDs or amounts

get.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific journal entry including all debit and credit lines

put.description: Update an existing journal entry. Only draft (unposted) entries can be updated. Posted entries are immutable.

requestBody.description: Journal entry data to update (debits must equal credits)

400.description: Bad request - Cannot update posted entry or debits do not equal credits

delete.description: Delete a journal entry. Only draft (unposted) entries can be deleted. Posted entries cannot be deleted to maintain audit trail.

400.description: Bad request - Cannot delete posted entry

post.description: Post a draft journal entry to the general ledger. This action is irreversible and updates all account balances. Entry must be balanced (debits = credits).

400.description: Bad request - Entry already posted or not balanced

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of payments with filtering by status, customer, payment method, date range, and search capabilities

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in payment number, reference, or notes

post.description: Record a new customer payment. Optionally allocate the payment to specific invoices. Unallocated amount will remain as credit on account.

requestBody.description: Payment data with optional invoice allocations

400.description: Bad request - Invalid allocation or amount exceeds invoice balance

422.description: Validation error - Invalid customer, invoice, or amount

get.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific payment including all invoice allocations

put.description: Update an existing payment. Only pending payments can be fully edited. Completed payments have limited update options.

400.description: Bad request - Cannot update completed or refunded payment

delete.description: Delete a payment record. Only pending or failed payments can be deleted. Completed payments should be cancelled or refunded instead to maintain audit trail.

400.description: Bad request - Cannot delete completed or refunded payment

post.description: Allocate or re-allocate payment amounts to specific invoices. This updates invoice balances and statuses automatically. Total allocations cannot exceed payment amount.

400.description: Bad request - Allocation exceeds payment amount or invoice already paid

422.description: Validation error - Invalid invoice or amount

post.description: Mark a pending payment as completed. This finalizes the payment and updates all allocated invoice statuses. This action is typically used after payment verification.

400.description: Bad request - Payment not in pending status

post.description: Cancel a payment and reverse all invoice allocations. This updates the status to 'cancelled' and restores invoice balances. Use for failed or voided payments.

400.description: Bad request - Payment already cancelled or refunded

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of audit logs with optional filtering by user, event type, and auditable model. Automatically filtered by tenant context if available.

parameters.name: auditable_type
parameters.description: Filter by auditable model type (full class name)

parameters.name: auditable_id
parameters.description: Filter by auditable model ID (use with auditable_type)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific audit log entry. Access is restricted by tenant context.
Retrieve all configuration key-value pairs for the current tenant. Requires authentication and tenant context.

post.description: Set a configuration key-value pair. If the key already exists, it will be updated. Requires authentication and tenant context.

value.description: Configuration value (can be string, number, boolean, object, or array)

get.description: Retrieve a specific configuration value by its key. Requires authentication and tenant context.

delete.description: Remove a configuration key-value pair from the tenant's settings. Requires authentication and tenant context.

get.description: Returns the current health status of the system including database and cache connectivity checks. This endpoint is public and does not require authentication.
Retrieve comprehensive tenant configuration including theme, locale, currency, enabled features, and available modules. Requires authentication and tenant context.
Retrieve detailed metadata for a specific module including routes, navigation items, permissions, and features. Requires authentication and tenant context.
Retrieve dynamic form configuration including fields, validation rules, sections, and buttons. Used by frontend to render forms dynamically. Requires authentication and tenant context.

description.example: Create a new product in the inventory

get.description: Retrieve dynamic table/data grid configuration including columns, sorting, filtering, pagination, and action buttons. Used by frontend to render tables dynamically. Requires authentication and tenant context.
Retrieve dynamic dashboard configuration including widgets, charts, and layout. Requires authentication and tenant context.

parameters.name: dashboardId
parameters.description: Dashboard identifier (defaults to 'default' if not provided)

get.description: Retrieve permissions and roles for the authenticated user, including user-level, role-level, and tenant-level permissions. Used by frontend for UI authorization. Requires authentication and tenant context.
Retrieve metadata for all available modules for the current tenant. Includes enabled/disabled status and module capabilities. Requires authentication and tenant context.

Retrieve the complete navigation menu structure for the current tenant based on enabled modules and user permissions. Used by frontend to build main navigation. Requires authentication and tenant context.

get.summary: Get all permissions for current user
get.description: Retrieve a flat list of all permissions assigned to the authenticated user. Requires authentication and tenant context.
Retrieve workflow state machine configuration including states, transitions, and permissions. Used for approval workflows and status management. Requires authentication and tenant context.
Retrieve a paginated list of tenants with optional filtering by status and search query. Requires admin role.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter by tenant name or domain

post.description: Create a new tenant organization with specified details. Requires admin role.

domain: The domain has already been taken.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific tenant by its UUID. Requires admin role.

put.description: Update an existing tenant's information. All fields are optional. Requires admin role.

delete.description: Permanently delete a tenant and all associated data. This action cannot be undone. Requires admin role.

post.description: Suspend a tenant's access to the system. The tenant will not be able to login or access resources. Requires admin role.
Activate a previously suspended tenant, restoring full access to the system. Requires admin role.
Authenticate user credentials and generate access token
Register a new user account

message.example: Registration successful. Please check your email to verify your account.

post.description: Logout current user and revoke access token
Logout user from all devices by revoking all access tokens
Generate a new access token for the authenticated user
Send password reset link to user's email

message.example: Password reset link sent to your email

post.description: Reset user password using the token sent via email

get.description: Retrieve the currently authenticated user's profile with roles and permissions
Retrieve all permissions in the system

post.description: Create a new permission with resource and action

get.description: Retrieve a specific permission by its ID

delete.description: Delete a permission from the system

get.description: Retrieve all permissions for a specific resource
Retrieve all permissions grouped by their resource type

post.description: Create multiple permissions for a resource with different actions at once

actions.description: Array of action names (e.g., create, read, update, delete)

get.description: Retrieve all roles in the system

post.description: Create a new role with optional permissions and parent role

get.description: Retrieve a specific role by its ID

delete.description: Delete a role from the system

post.description: Assign one or more permissions to a role

permissions.description: Array of permission names to assign

post.description: Revoke one or more permissions from a role

permissions.description: Array of permission names to revoke

post.description: Replace all role permissions with the specified set of permissions

permissions.description: Array of permission names (all existing permissions will be replaced with these)

get.description: Retrieve the hierarchical structure of all roles
Retrieve all permissions assigned to a specific role
Retrieve paginated list of all users

post.description: Create a new user with specified roles and permissions

get.description: Search users by name or email
Retrieve a specific user by their ID

delete.description: Delete a user from the system

get.description: Retrieve the current user's profile information

put.description: Update the current user's profile information

post.description: Change the current user's password
Activate a deactivated user account
Deactivate an active user account
Assign a role to a specific user
Remove a role from a specific user
Replace all user roles with the specified set of roles

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of all products with filtering, sorting, and search capabilities

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by product name, SKU, or description

post.description: Create a new product with variants and attributes

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product including variants and stock info

put.description: Update an existing product's information, variants, and attributes

delete.description: Delete a product from the system. Products with existing stock cannot be deleted.

400.description: Bad request - Product has stock or dependencies

get.description: Retrieve a product by its SKU code

422.description: Validation error - SKU parameter is missing or invalid

get.description: Retrieve all products with stock levels below their reorder level

post.description: Import multiple products at once. Returns summary of successful and failed imports.

failed.description: Number of products that failed to import

errors.description: List of errors for failed imports

422.description: Validation error - Invalid product data format

get.summary: Get stock movements for a product
get.description: Retrieve paginated list of stock movements (transactions) for a specific product with filtering by warehouse, transaction type, and date range
Retrieve current stock level for a product in a specific warehouse and optional location

get.summary: Get total stock for a product
get.description: Retrieve total stock quantity for a product across all warehouses

post.description: Record a new stock transaction (receipt, issue, transfer, etc.)

400.description: Bad request - Insufficient stock or invalid operation

post.description: Adjust stock quantity up or down with a reason (physical count, damaged, etc.)
Reserve stock quantity for a sales order or other reference document
Allocate reserved stock for picking/shipment
Release reserved or allocated stock back to available stock (e.g., when an order is cancelled)

get.description: Calculate total stock value for a warehouse or all warehouses based on average cost

parameters.name: warehouse_id
parameters.description: Warehouse ID (optional - calculates for all warehouses if not provided)

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of all warehouses with filtering and search capabilities

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by warehouse name, code, or city

post.description: Create a new warehouse with location and contact information

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific warehouse including locations and stock levels

delete.description: Delete a warehouse from the system. Warehouses with existing stock cannot be deleted.

get.description: Retrieve stock summary for a warehouse including total products, quantities, and value

low_stock_products.description: Number of products below reorder level

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of goods receipts with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new goods receipt from a purchase order

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific goods receipt
Retrieve paginated list of purchase orders with optional filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in order number and notes

post.description: Create a new purchase order

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific purchase order

post.description: Approve a purchase order for processing
Submit purchase order to supplier
Cancel a purchase order

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of suppliers/vendors with optional filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in supplier name, email, and code

post.description: Create a new supplier/vendor

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific supplier

post.description: Activate a suspended or inactive supplier
Suspend a supplier from doing business

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of all sales orders with filtering, sorting, and search capabilities

post.description: Create a new sales order with line items. The order will be created in draft status by default.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific sales order including all line items and customer details

put.description: Update an existing sales order. Can update order details, status, and line items.

delete.description: Soft delete a sales order. The order will be marked as deleted but retained in the database for audit purposes.

configuration.description: Tenant-specific settings (visible to users with view_settings permission)

errors.description: Optional validation errors or additional error details

Account.title: Account
Account.description: Chart of accounts entry representing an accounting account

parent_id.description: Parent account ID for hierarchical structure

type.description: Account type based on fundamental accounting equation

is_active.description: Whether account is active and can be used in transactions

is_system.description: Whether this is a system account that cannot be deleted

JournalEntry.title: Journal Entry
JournalEntry.description: Double-entry accounting journal entry with debit and credit lines

reference.description: External reference or source document number

is_posted.description: Whether entry is posted to general ledger

lines.description: Journal entry lines (minimum 2 required for double-entry)

JournalEntryLine.title: Journal Entry Line
JournalEntryLine.description: Individual line item in a journal entry

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: Customer invoice for accounts receivable management

sent_at.description: When invoice was sent to customer

reference.description: External payment reference or transaction ID

PaymentAllocation.title: Payment Allocation
PaymentAllocation.description: Allocation of payment amount to specific invoice

StoreAccountRequest.title: Store Account Request
StoreAccountRequest.description: Request body for creating a new account

UpdateAccountRequest.title: Update Account Request
UpdateAccountRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing account

StoreJournalEntryRequest.title: Store Journal Entry Request
StoreJournalEntryRequest.description: Request body for creating a new journal entry

UpdateJournalEntryRequest.title: Update Journal Entry Request
UpdateJournalEntryRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing journal entry (only if not posted)

StoreInvoiceRequest.title: Store Invoice Request
StoreInvoiceRequest.description: Request body for creating a new invoice

due_date.description: Payment due date (must be on or after invoice_date)

UpdateInvoiceRequest.title: Update Invoice Request
UpdateInvoiceRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing invoice

StorePaymentRequest.title: Store Payment Request
StorePaymentRequest.description: Request body for recording a new payment

UpdatePaymentRequest.title: Update Payment Request
UpdatePaymentRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing payment

AllocatePaymentRequest.title: Allocate Payment Request
AllocatePaymentRequest.description: Request body for allocating payment to invoices

User.title: User
User.description: User model representing a system user

system_role.description: Whether this is a system-managed role

editable.description: Whether this role can be edited

Permission.title: Permission
Permission.description: Permission model for fine-grained access control

system_managed.description: Whether this is a system-managed permission

remember.description: Remember user session for extended period

mfa_code.description: Multi-factor authentication code (if MFA is enabled)

password.description: User's password (min 8 chars, mixed case, numbers, symbols)

roles.description: Role names to assign to user

permissions.description: Permission names to assign directly to user

roles.description: Role names to assign to user

permissions.description: Permission names to assign directly to user
Permission names to assign to role
Permission names to assign to role

action.description: Action name (e.g., create, read, update, delete)

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Product model representing an inventory item

track_serials.description: Whether serial number tracking is enabled

ProductVariant.title: Product Variant
ProductVariant.description: Product variant representing a variation of a product

Warehouse.title: Warehouse
Warehouse.description: Warehouse model representing a storage facility

low_stock_products.description: Number of products with low stock

StockLevel.title: Stock Level
StockLevel.description: Current stock level for a product in a warehouse

unit_cost.description: Unit cost at time of transaction

custom_attributes.description: Custom product attributes as key-value pairs

quantity.description: Adjustment quantity (positive for increase, negative for decrease)
Quantity to reserve (must be greater than 0)
Quantity to release (must be greater than 0)

PurchaseOrderRequest.title: Purchase Order Request
PurchaseOrderRequest.description: Request body for creating/updating purchase orders

GoodsReceiptRequest.title: Goods Receipt Request
GoodsReceiptRequest.description: Request body for creating/updating goods receipts

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Customer model representing a sales customer with CRM capabilities

formatted.example: 123 Main Street, Suite 100, New York, NY 10001, USA
456 Oak Avenue, Building B, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA

SalesOrder.title: Sales Order
SalesOrder.description: Sales order representing a customer purchase order

billing_address.example: 123 Main Street, Suite 100, New York, NY 10001, USA

shipping_address.example: 456 Oak Avenue, Building B, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA

subtotal.description: Order subtotal before tax and discount

SalesOrderItem.title: Sales Order Item
SalesOrderItem.description: Line item in a sales order

subtotal.description: Quotation subtotal before tax and discount

terms_and_conditions.example: Payment due within 30 days of invoice date

StoreSalesOrderRequest.title: Store Sales Order Request
StoreSalesOrderRequest.description: Request body for creating a new sales order

UpdateSalesOrderRequest.title: Update Sales Order Request
UpdateSalesOrderRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing sales order

items.description: Order line items (if provided, replaces all existing items)

sanctum_token.description: Laravel Sanctum Bearer Token Authentication. Obtain token from /api/auth/login endpoint.
